actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Veterans' Administration to use its own legal counsel to pursue civil remedies for the collection of overpayments of educational assistance made to eligible veterans and dependents and for the collection of education loans which have been defaulted, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Veterans' Administration to use its own legal counsel to pursue civil remedies for the collection of overpayments of educational assistance made to eligible veterans and dependents and for the collection of defaulted educational loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Veterans' Administration to use its own legal counsel to pursue civil remedies for the collection of overpayments of educational assistance made to eligible veterans and dependents and for the collection of education loans which have been defaulted, and for other purposes.
